marketing-hero.title: Speed up your project setup by
marketing-hero.description: Boost your web development with FindPlate, your complete Next.js starter kit for SaaS, AI tools, and more. Turn your ideas into revenue quickly.

marketing-about.overview: The boilerplate comes with everything you need to build modern web apps.

f-1.title: Secure Authentication
f-1.description: Ready-to-use, secure user authentication with Next Auth.

f-2.title: Insightful Analytics
f-2.description: Monitor your app's usage with LogSnag.

f-3.title: Email Integration
f-3.description: Seamless email sending with Nodemailer and Gmail SMTP.

f-4.title: Ready Components
f-4.description: Variety of pre-built pages and UI components.

f-5.title: Database Management
f-5.description: Efficient database handling with Prisma ORM.

f-6.title: Global Reach
f-6.description: Built-in support for multiple languages with Next Internationalization.

f-7.title: Blog Pages
f-7.description: Create, edit, and manage blog posts with static Markdown pages.

f-8.title: SEO Optimized
f-8.description: Optimized for search engines with next-seo.

f-9.title: Functions Everywhere
f-9.description: Copy & paste functionalities with server actions

f-10.title: Dark Mode
f-10.description: Toggle between light and dark mode with a click.

marketing-faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
marketing-faqs.description: Need help with something? Here are some of the most common questions we get.
marketing-faqs.contact: Still have questions? Email us at

questions.answer-1: FindPlate is a comprehensive Next.js boilerplate designed to help web developers quickly start and build web applications, offering essential features like authentication, email sending, and more right out of the box.
questions.answer-2: FindPlate is ideal for web developers, software engineers, and tech startups looking for a robust foundation to start their projects quickly and efficiently.

questions.answer-1: FindPlate includes ready-to-use authentication, email sending, pre-built pages and components, internationalization (i18n) support, Tailwind CSS styling, Prisma ORM integration, and a blogging system.
questions.ques-2: Can I customize the pre-built components?
questions.answer-2: Yes, all pre-built pages and components are fully customizable, allowing you to tailor them to fit your specific project needs.

questions.answer-1: Installation is straightforwardâ€”simply clone the repository, install the necessary dependencies, and configure your environment variables to get started.
questions.ques-2: Is there documentation available for setup?
questions.answer-2: Currently not, we are working on it. However, you can refer to the README file in the FindPlate repository for detailed instructions on setting up the project.

questions.ques-1: Will I receive updates after purchasing FindPlate?
questions.answer-1: Yes, all users receive lifetime updates, ensuring that your boilerplate stays up-to-date with the latest tools and best practices.
questions.ques-2: Where can I get support if I encounter issues?
questions.answer-2: Support is available through our dedicated support channels, where you can ask questions and get help with any issues you might face while using FindPlate.
